haberman.rhizomatics.ui.anim

Class SlideAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.animation.Animation
      • haberman.rhizomatics.ui.anim.SlideAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SlideAnimation
extends android.view.animation.Animation
    2 states animator that will take a view in or out on a given side of the screen.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SlideAnimation.Side
      Enum the four possible sides of transformation.
      static class  SlideAnimation.State
      Enum the possible animations' states.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlideAnimation

        public SlideAnimation(android.view.View view,
                      float inset,
                      @Nullable
                      SlideAnimation.Side side)
        Constructor. A slide animation is given by a inset amount of pixels to slide the view in, upon a given SlideAnimation.Side.
        Parameters:
        view - The view on which animation occurs
        inset - The amount of pixels slide in.
        side - The side from which the view_ comes in
